Description:
Convenient Lifestyle on Offer!
Get in the market with this 1 bedroom apartment close to everything you need for a fabulous lifestyle.
Modern tones throughout including in the open plan kitchen/living with split system & floating floor boards. Sliding door leads to your good-sized balcony, ready for a vertical garden! Sparkling bathroom, euro laundry. Large bedroom with robes.
Conveniently located about 300m approx. to Coburg station, Sydney Road tram, cafÃ©s , restaurants & supermarkets. Jump on your bike as Upfield Bike Path is just a stone's throw from your door.
A great option for either an investor or first home buyer!
Insights: 3/10 Hudson Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 26 other 1 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Relax, Unwind, Enjoy!
This front villa unit is all about easy living, designed to maximize living space and enjoyment, whilst minimizing maintenance, so you'll have plenty of time on your hands to enjoy all of life's pleasures. Comprising a single-level layout with spacious lounge, opening to North facing courtyard. Floorboards feature in the family/meals area and spacious kitchen, complete with dishwasher and generous storage. One of two bedrooms ( both with BIR's ) provides direct access to dual-entry bathroom and ducted heating and remote control single garage are included. Short walk to all the amenities provided by Melville & Sydney Roads and Bell Street.
Owners Corporation: $504.00p.a
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY 17/11 AT 12PM!
Basking in a northern light and seclusion, this gorgeous block fronted Victorian makes you feel like you are miles from nowhere, yet here it rests in this popular pocket, strolling distance from the lifestyle advantages of lively Sydney Road. Beyond the bull-nose verandah facade, vibrant colours brighten the home's period character that retains the high ceilings, rosettes and beautiful period fireplaces of its era. Discover two generous front bedrooms, serviced by a unique bathroom featuring spectacular mosaic tiled flooring. Filled with natural light the fireside open living, meals area and timber kitchen, opens to a picturesque garden setting that's so peaceful and calming incorporating a paved area for firing up the BBQ & covered outdoor area for dining alfresco with friends. A well built workshop/studio/bungalow at the rear offers a versatile space from those who like to work from home or are seeking potential accomodation/living space. Included are ducted heating and driveway for ample off street parking. Only moments to Coburg Train Station, Sydney Road Shopping, local schools & parks.
Insights: 36 Chambers Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Period Charm in a Prime Location!
This beautiful free standing single fronted Victorian home situated on a 530m2 approx block is adorned with many period character features including high ceilings with heritage Victorian cornices, original pine floors complimented with heritage Victorian skirting boards and antique light fittings.
Boasting three generous size bedrooms all with built in wardrobes, including a beautiful fireplace in the master bedroom and second bedroom. A large formal living area comes complete with a stunning fireplace and an outstanding timber mantel piece. The open dining/living area adjoins onto the well-kept kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and an abundance of storage space.
Leading out through the French doors is your own private covered decking area, with a built-in sink, looking out over a luscious landscaped green garden. A storage and a work shed are located on the side of the house. Serviced by the elegant bathroom with a freestanding bathtub, separate shower, toilet and its own laundry area with plenty of storage space. With potential of extensions going out or upwards (STCA) and adding off street parking via the rear ROW. Complementing this stunning family home is solar panels, a single undercover car space, side gate access from both sides of the house and the lane way, generous attic space, alarm system, underfloor ducted heating throughout and air conditioning in the open living space.
The property is a stone's throw away to Coburg Primary & Secondary College, Coburg Lake, Upfield bike path, Coburg leisure centre, Sydney Road, Bell Street & Louisa Street each with a large choice of restaurants, cafes and supermarkets to choose from. As for public transport you have Sydney road tram (no 19), Coburg and Moreland Train Station and the bus interchange on the corner of Bell Street and Sydney Road with five different buses routes (no 513, 527, 534, 561 & 904).
You can't go past this true Coburg beauty!
Insights: 36 Loch Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
The Period Perfect Entertainer
From its romantic façade and tessellated tile verandah, through sumptuous interiors and on to an entertainer's deck, this three bedroom home superbly balances period craftsmanship with thoroughly modern living. Resplendent with leadlight, fretwork, soaring ornate ceiling and cornices throughout, this impressive home features free flowing living and dining with an elegant gas log fireplace. A gourmet kitchen boasting 900mm range links the living domain to a vast deck, complete with fairy lights and retractable awning forming an all-weather entertainers haven. Bedrooms share a bathroom with claw foot tub, while quality continues through heating/cooling, alarm, plantation shutters and double carport with remote. Nestled between Nicholson Street and Sydney Road trams, cafes and shopping, moments to Merri Creek parklands and schools, inspection will impress.
Insights: 59 Harding Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Industry Excellence
One of Pentridge's most historic pockets provides the perfect setting for this trendy townhouse that's sure to make an impression with its generous two-storey design, quality inclusions and outstanding urban convenience. Sleek and stylish interior comprises two double bedrooms (master with WIR and its own full-width terrace), two-way bathroom with marble-top vanity and additional powder room (second WC). Add to this a granite-bench kitchen with gas cooktop and integrated dishwasher, expansive open-plan living/dining area with polished concrete floors leading out to a delightful bluestone-walled courtyard with established garden surrounds. Other features of the home include split-system air conditioning and additional Nobo panel heaters, European laundry and under-stair storage, plus intercom/secure entry, lower-level parking space and storage cage. Walking distance to Sydney Road trams, popular eateries and renowned retail precinct, it's also close to Coburg Station, Coburg High School, the lush surrounds of Coburg Lake and endless Merri Creek trails.
Insights: 21/5 Industry Lane, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Prepare to be surprised.
Beautifully spacious, with an unexpectedly generous backyard to match, this elevated two bedroom villa flaunts a front position and secure double carport. Neatly presented, immediately comfortable and instantly welcoming, it's exactly the kind of canvas that updaters, enhancers and renovators are in the market for. With a vast living room, adjoining kitchen and meals and lots of space to relax outside, it's enhanced by split system heating and cooling. Bedrooms include a main with built-in robe, the central bathroom has a shower and bath, plus there's a laundry and convenient separate toilet. You'll find transport right out front, local shops are just seconds away and it's only a stroll to parks and the popular Merri Creek walking and cycling trail.

Description:
Clinker Brick Classic with Extended Versatility
An environment of contemporary class while still retaining the allure of its Art Deco origins, this captivating period home delivers an outstanding inner-urban lifestyle with its floorplan flexibility, impressive quality and locational practicality. Surrounded by immaculate gardens, the home's light-filled interior showcases three genuinely large bedrooms (all with robes) and two stylish bathrooms - one on each level. Add to this open-design living and dining spaces complemented by a well-appointed kitchen with dishwasher and stainless steel cooking appliances. Other features include gas heating and split-system air conditioning, original Art Deco ceilings and polished hardwood floors, large laundry and under-stair storeroom. Step outside to discover an al-fresco style entertaining deck and generous backyard garden with storeroom/shed, plus the added advantage of gated front off-street parking. Walking distance to Melville Road trams, local buses, Coburg West and St Fidelis primary schools, zoned for Strathmore Secondary, it's also close to Coburg Station and shopping precinct as well as easy access to Citylink/Tullamarine Freeway. Simply move in and start living!
Agent: Nelson Alexander Pty Ltd

Description:
Period 1886 Charmer
A fantastic opportunity exists with this character filled 1886 period home and attached clinic/home business. Situated on an extremely large corner block on approximately 695m2 of land, central to Sydney Road shops, restaurants, schools and a choice of bus, train, tram transport and close proximity to the CBD, Airport and Major shopping centres. Offering potentially 5 bedrooms including master with walk-in-robe, mezzanine retreat, home offices with scope for a home business/granny flat with its own separate entrance, or period family home renovator. Alternatively, it offers immense appeal for investors and property developers with dual street access [subject to council approval]. Behind a classic façade finds a grand chandelier lite hallway/leadlight/12 foot towering ceilings, formal lounge, open plan living area with sunken floor and dinning space, galley style kitchen with quality appliances. Along with main bathroom, powder rooms, reverse cycle heating/cooling, gas heating, security system, alfresco/manicured gardens, with automated triple garage/storage and a separate front off street parking area.
Insights: 62 Ohea Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 12 other 5 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
On Trend Living With A Designer Edge
Architecturally designed and stylishly finished, this artful shop conversion delivers a unique three bedroom residence that combines light-filled interiors with seamless outdoor entertaining to marvellous effect. A free flowing living domain flooded in natural light and lined with Tasmanian Oak floors makes a sharp first impression. Serviced by a spacious galley kitchen with Blanco appliances and flanked by an entertainer's courtyard with gas plumbed built-in barbeque and sublime private sun deck, it presents seamless indoor-outdoor living and entertaining. Timber stairs lead to privately zoned bedrooms enjoying leafy vistas and built-in robes, the generous master boasting its own private sundeck, and complemented by a stylish family bathroom where a deep soaker tub, separate shower and floating vanity add class and luxe appeal. Quality continues through split system heating/cooling, exceptional storage, single garage with remote and internal access, plus an additional off-street car space. In a prestige locale, enviably surrounded by parks, schools including St Fideles and Coburg West Primary, Melville and Sydney Road trams, Citylink freeway, cafes and specialty shopping, Coburg Station and the Upfield Bike Path, this unique and utterly modern residence promises a lifestyle and opportunity not to be missed.
Insights: 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Located in the heart of Coburg, this outstanding development is architecturally designed with contemporary modern and luxury finishes.

Immerse yourself in the beautiful multicultural surroundings of Coburg a great place to call home.
Apartments are complete and ready to move into !!
1 & 2 bedroom apartments available.

Description:
A New Standard in Contemporary Quality
Luxurious, light filled and located to impress, this brand new, three bedroom, three bathroom residence overflows with features. South of Bell Street, seconds to Coburg's most prestigious streets and in an appealing pocket of its own, this shining home takes front position in a boutique block of four. Trams, buses, cafes, schools, Merri Creek Trail and buzzing Sydney Road are all just a stroll away.

Description:
Outstanding family living
From its unassuming street frontage comes this slice of luxury nestled within a peaceful pocket of inner city Coburg. This convenient picturesque suburb is well known for its multiculturalism, food culture and handiness to local schools and lush parklands including Coburg Lake. Step foot through the front door and be instantly wowed by the beauty of this fully renovated weatherboard abode. Enhanced by hardwood timber floorboards and a beautiful colour palate. The well thought out floor plan offers an entrance hall flowing to a lovely sitting area or study, with three robed bedrooms (master with a chic ensuite) a central stone bathroom enriched with a tiled walk in shower and a family sized laundry. To the rear, a divine open plan living and meals bathed in natural light and accompanied by an elegant designer's kitchen equipped with shaker style cabinetry storage, a walk-in pantry, high end Miele stainless steel appliances with range hood and a fabulous stone island breakfast bar. Retractable sliding doors open out to a decked entertaining area with a low maintenance rear yard for the kids to have a run around. Boasting an enviable lifestyle moments to Sydney and Melville Road shopping and dining precincts, St Fidelis Catholic Primary School, Moreland Train station, local trams and surrounding parklands.
Insights: 8 Queen Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
3BR Single-Level Sensation in a Perfect Location
With its clever floorplan, premium features and abundance of natural light throughout, this single-level rear villa delivers an outstanding lifestyle of low-maintenance luxury and central Coburg convenience. Quality at every turn, the home's designer interior showcases three double bedrooms (all with mirrored robes), two stunning ensuites and central bathroom - all with stone-top vanities and floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this a spacious open-plan living/dining area complemented by a sleek stone-bench kitchen with tiled splashbacks, soft-close cabinetry and integrated dishwasher. Other features include split-system heating and cooling (living area and all bedrooms), alarm, LED lighting, square-set cornices and stylish matt-black fittings, European laundry (also with stone benchtop), plus a private north-facing courtyard with al-fresco entertaining patio, established gardens, synthetic turf and secure carport (remote-controlled rollerdoor) via ROW. Walking distance to Sydney Road cafes and trams to uni/hospital precincts and the CBD, it's also close to local parks and popular primary schools as well as Coburg Station and renowned shopping precinct.
Insights: 5/2 Loch Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 10 other 3 bedroom unit in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Beautifully Presented Victorian in a Perfect Location!
Enviably situated on a deep corner block only moments from Moreland Station, Sydney Road cafes, parks and the Upfield Bike Path, this beautifully presented Victorian Terrace will charm you with its fusion of period grace and smart modern finishes.
Wonderfully maintained since its construction in 1903, this property showcases heritage features throughout. Impressive high ceilings, stained glass, deep-dish cornices, ceiling rosettes, stunning Victorian chimneys and 3 fireplaces combine with whitewashed floorboards and plantation shutters, adding modern appeal and sophistication.
The flexible floor plan features two generous bedrooms with built-in wardrobes and a charming formal living area that offers the option of a third bedroom. Skylights and stained glass windows provide the spacious kitchen/meals area and adjoining dining room/study with natural light, highlighting the exposed brick feature walls. Past the modern bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, you find the delightful, private garden and large lock-up work shed/storage space, gated access to off-street parking with automatic roller door and a separate laundry.
Sitting amidst similar period beauty in the Moreland Heritage Precinct, this family home offers buyers an irresistible piece of local history in a sought after pocket of Coburg.
Insights: 27 Station Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Boutique Luxury in the Heart of Coburg
Tucked away in a stylish modern block, this stunning townhouse is sure to make an impression with its clever design, first-class features and exceptional location. Bathed in northerly light, the home's meticulously-detailed interior comprises two bedrooms (large master with fitted WIR) and dedicated study, deluxe ensuite, main bathroom and guest powder room - all with stone-top vanities and floor-to-ceiling tiles. Add to this a spacious open-plan living/dining area with stacker doors leading out to a sunny north-facing courtyard with high fences for added privacy. Other highlights include a stone-bench kitchen with soft-close cabinetry and integrated dishwasher, as well as split-system heating and cooling (living area and both bedrooms), alarm, efficient LED lighting and stylish matt-black fittings, European laundry and under-stair storage, plus secure carport (remote-controlled rollerdoor) via ROW. Walking distance to Sydney Road cafes and trams to uni/hospital precincts and the CBD, it's also close to local parks and popular primary schools as well as Coburg Station and renowned shopping precinct.
Insights: 2/2 Loch Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Simply charming
Splendidly restored and extended, this three bedroom plus study/fourth bedroom California Bungalow is steps to Coburg Lake Reserve and Batman station. Screening plants and double glazing achieve privacy and a whisper quiet interior introduced by a charming lounge with modern fireplace. A full complement of appliances, stone counters and ample soft closing joinery define the kitchen/meals which leads to a vast undercover alfresco area. Near new, two smart bathrooms, one with laundry function, deliver superb service. Generous accommodation includes BIRs, the elegant master also with chic ensuite. The study easily repurposes as a fourth bedroom or retreat. Also with ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm and off street parking.
Insights: 13 Gaffney Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Tightly held by the same owner for decades, this neat and tidy weatherboard classic sits in one of Coburg's finest streets, and is the perfect option for those with vision to enhance to their liking by renovating or extending (subject to council approval). Set across a substantial allotment of approximately 460 m2, it comprises two spacious bedrooms, a central bathroom, separate lounge/dining room plus a central kitchen. A bay window, gas heating, wide side drive, storage shed, plus a lock up garage all complete this outstanding package. Enjoying a second to none location, it is only moments to both Moreland & Coburg Train Stations, Melville Rd Tramline, Coburg West Primary School, St. Fidelis Primary School & The Sydney Rd Shopping Precinct.
Insights: 44 Phillips Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 58 other 2 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Widespread family appeal in one of Coburg's best streets
The classic Californian presence on one of Coburg's most sought-after streets introduces the wide frontage and wonderful appeal of this delightful double-fronted residence on 603m2 (approx.). Surrounded by garden including spacious backyard with huge covered deck (CBD glimpses) and ROW, the irresistible indoor-outdoor lifestyle is certain to excite a growing inner-city family. Ducted heating and split-system air-conditioning complement period character and charm expressed throughout the modernized 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom layout. Offers main bedroom with ensuite, BIRs, substantial family living/dining area, impressive kitchen (Technika Bellissimo cooker, dishwasher), family bathroom (clawfoot bath), laundry and large garden. A superb home in a coveted position near schools, parkland, Buses, Trams, Moreland Train Station and buzzing Sydney Rd.
Insights: 16 Clarendon Street, Coburg VIC 3058 was last sold in 2018 and 146 other 3 bedroom house in Coburg have recently been sold.

Description:
Looking to Invest ? Solid older style apartment in convenient location.
This first floor apartment is currently leased for 12 months at $300 per week. Have the tenants enjoy the convenience of Batman Station, Bunnings, Coles, Sydney Road, trams and the CBD.
• First floor, with front balcony accessed from living area.
• Glowing timber blue gum parquetry floors, on sound proof underlay, accentuates the open design .
• Flow on style using a timber breakfast bar and matching stools.
• Elegant look all white new kitchen cabinets with Swedish designed soft close hinges and pantry with stainless steel slide out drawers.
• Built-in desk, study or computer area. Sound treatment to adjoining party wall.
• As new electric cooker and range hood. New circuit board.
• Separate bathroom with shower over bath and under bench laundry facilities.
• Single carport and storage shed.
• Block of only 7 apartments.
Build your wealth with property!!
Inspect by appointment or as advertised.
Agent in Conjunction McLeod Real Estate & Finance Cath McLeod 0412352338
